cause.description:
An initiative beginning in Pittsburgh in order to aid the non-denominational Kibbutz-like orphanage in Carmiel, Israel.
1. Family is a right.
2. Love is a right.
3. Children deserve to be loved.
4. Children deserve to be children.
cause.mission: Improve the lives of the wonderful children at the village.
cause.name: K'far Hayeladim (The Children's Village)
